#summary Getting started with the gwt-gantt widget library.

= Setup =

 # Add the `gwt-gantt` jar file to your project's build path. Right-click on the project node in the Package Explorer and select 'Build Path > Add External Archives...'. Specify the downloaded `gwt-gantt-<version>.jar`
 # Modify `<Your Application>.gwt.xm`l to inherit the `gwt-gantt` module:
{{{
  <inherits name='com.bradrydzewski.Gantt' />
}}}


= Creating a Gantt Chart =

You can add the gannt chart to a 'Panel' just like any standard GWT widget:
{{{
  GanttChart gantt = new GanttChart();
  gantt.setWidth("500px");
  gantt.setHeight("400px");

  RootPanel.get().add(gantt);
}}}

= Adding Tasks =

The following code snippet demonstrates how to create and add a `Task` to the `GanttChart` widget. Every time a `Task` is added to the `GanttChart` the layout is re-calculated and refreshed.

{{{
   TaskImpl task = new TaskImpl();
   task.setUID(1);
   task.setSummary(true);
   task.setName("Test Task 1");
   task.setLevel(0);
   task.setOrder(1);
   task.setPercentComplete(50);
   task.setStart(new Date());
   task.setFinish(new Date());

   //add the task to the gantt chart
   gantt.addItem(task);

}}}
